      • fromString

        public static float[][] fromString(java.lang.String s,
                   char colDelim,
                   java.lang.String rowDelim)
        Parameters:
        s - A String representation of a matrix, eg from toString(float[][], char, String)
        colDelim - The character used to delimit matrix columns in this string
        rowDelim - The string (can be >1 chars) used to delimit matrix rows in this string
        Returns:
        The matrix represented by the string

      • toString

                        char colDelim,
                        java.lang.String rowDelim)
        Parameters:
        matrix - A matrix
        colDelim - A character to be used to delimit matrix columns
        rowDelim - A String to be used to delimit matrix rows
        Returns:
        A String representation of the given matrix using the given delimiters
